channel.title: Purp Sweets - Remove One Each Time
channel.description:
How do I make it so when I eat Purple sweets it doesn't remove the whole item from the inventory but only removes one from the stack?
I'm looking at this code here, I've already added the item to food but how can I set it to subtract one from the slot instead of setting the slot to a newId or removing the item? [code]player.getInventory().getItems().set(slot, food.getNewId() == 0 ? null : new Item(food.getNewId(), 1));[/code]

item.title: Purp Sweets - Remove One Each Time
item.dc:creator: @winK winK
item.description:
@winK wrote:

I tested it with just it set to 1 and it worked, thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Purp Sweets - Remove One Each Time

item.title: Purp Sweets - Remove One Each Time
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Each time you eat a piece of food you consume the food and that obviously reduces food from your item slot.

Read full topic
item.source: Purp Sweets - Remove One Each Time

item.title: Purp Sweets - Remove One Each Time
item.dc:creator: @winK winK
item.description:
@winK wrote:

Do I set the amount to 1 if I want it to remove one of that item from the stack? Or does that remove the item and set it to the item and that amount? If so, how do I make it subtract one from the current stack?

Read full topic
